description:
LOVE TO HELP OTHERS LOOK AND FEEL GORGEOUS WHILE EARNING BONUSES? JOIN OUR TEAM!

Do you like to be financially rewarded for your performance every pay period?

Are you passionate about people and beauty?

Are you naturally confident and outgoing?

Does the idea of increasing your personal pay drive you?

Do you like to multi-task?

If so, you need to join our team!

Turn your passion into a rewarding role with our growing team at European Wax Center! We're in the business of Revealing Beautiful Skin, and with your help, we'll give guests a reason to walk in, and strut out.

Here’s why you should come work with us:

· We believe that happy employees make happy guests, so you can expect a fun, upbeat, flexible work environment.

· We believe work should be interesting, so we’ll help you continuously develop new skills.

· We believe in promoting from within, so you’ll have opportunities for advancement.

Here’s what you need to bring to the table:

An upbeat attitude & committed to delighting our guests and—of course—having fun while being awesome!

Educating guests on the benefits of waxing and our wax packages.

Scheduling and confirming appointments and managing guest flow throughout the day.

Ability to work in a fun, fast-paced environment.

Ability to work a flexible schedule including nights and weekends, because that’s when we’re busy.

As a Beauty Advisor/Sales Associate, you'll have the drive and dedication to hit the ground running. Our comprehensive training will provide you with all the tools you will need and to show our appreciation, we offer great pay and performance incentives throughout your career!

Benefits:

Complimentary unlimited facial waxing, as well as discounts on all other services & retail products.

A fun, well-managed, successful work environment.

Hourly wage plus generous bonus plan.

Set schedule.

Career growth.

401k eligibility, Medical, Dental, and Vision coverage.

This role is perfect for those looking for full time opportunities. We are open 7 days a week and offer flexible shifts.

Experience:

Customer Service: 1 year (Preferred)

EWC is an equal opportunity employer

European Wax Center began as a family-owned business. Since 2004, we've provided our guests with a first-class waxing experience centering around:
• Our proprietary Comfort Wax®
• Private waxing suites
• A crisp, clean environment
• And the most professionally trained estheticians in the industry
From day one, we've been putting our values into action to delight our guests with an exceptional waxing experience.
